boat.name: boat
boat.title: small boat
boat.desc: capable of floating in water, and durable enough to resist acidic corrosion. it's barely large enough for one person.
boat.func_desc: will allow safe travel over acidic waters. do not unequip unless you are in a safe location.

wood_stick.name: wood_stick
wood_stick.title: wood plank
wood_stick.desc: a plank of old wood. versatile and abundant.

shovel.name: shovel
shovel.title: shovel
shovel.desc: digs holes. could also be used as a weapon in a pinch.
shovel.func_desc: a simple shovel, capable of digging a few feet into the ground, or filling in a hole.

alien_shard.name: alien_shard
alien_shard.title: unknown material shard
alien_shard.desc: a pyramidal, translucent material that glows purple from deep inside. its surface is perfectly smooth, and its four faces meet to form sharp points. it's also extremely heavy.

alien_fragment.name: alien_fragment
alien_fragment.title: unknown material fragment
alien_fragment.desc: a heavy, spherical material that mostly resembles stone, but it glows bright purple, its hue shifting slightly when viewed from different angles. its surface, where not cracked, is extremely smooth, and it has a unique scent.

rusty_knife.name: rusty_knife
rusty_knife.title: rusty knife
rusty_knife.desc: an old butcher's knife, edge rusted away, but still capable of damage.

crowbar.name: crowbar
crowbar.title: crowbar
crowbar.desc: a long, curved piece of steel, meant for prying things apart.

sign_block.name: sign_block
sign_block.title: wooden sign
sign_block.desc: a wooden sign, upon which a message can be written.
sign_block.build_desc: when placed, you will be able to write a short message on it, visible to any traveler who visits it.

auto_breaker.name: auto_breaker
auto_breaker.title: auto breaker
auto_breaker.desc: torogadude's magic auto-structure breaker. admins only, no plebeans allowed.

bolt_cutters.name: bolt_cutters
bolt_cutters.title: bolt cutters
bolt_cutters.desc: two long handles, bolted on an axle and tipped with steel. capable of snipping many materials.

baseball_bat.name: baseball_bat
baseball_bat.title: baseball bat
baseball_bat.desc: once used for sport, this bat now serves as a blunt weapon.

wood_block.name: wood_block
wood_block.title: wooden fence
wood_block.desc: a kilometer's worth of wooden fencing.
wood_block.build_desc: a kilometer of wooden fencing. it can't be walked over, but it's fairly easy to break through.

wood_door.name: wood_door
wood_door.title: wooden gate
wood_door.desc: a crude gate fashioned out of wood.
wood_door.build_desc: a crude gate fashioned out of wood. secured by a passcode mechanism.

wire.name: wire
wire.title: wire
wire.desc: a line of copper wrapped in an insulator to carry electricity.

copper_coil.name: copper_coil
copper_coil.title: copper coil
copper_coil.desc: hard and exposed copper wire, coiled around a plastic spool.

camo.name: camo
camo.title: active camouflage
camo.desc: when laying to rest, the user becomes very difficult to see, only visible within a range of 5 kilometers.
camo.func_desc: the areas concealed by the suit become invisible when worn. while your head and hands still stick out when standing, you are very difficult to see when asleep, only visible up to 5km away.

scrap_block.name: scrap_block
scrap_block.title: scrap metal fence
scrap_block.desc: a kilometer's worth of scrap metal fencing.
scrap_block.build_desc: a kilometer of scrap metal fencing. it can't be walked over, and takes some time to break through.

scrap_door.name: scrap_door
scrap_door.title: scrap metal gate
scrap_door.desc: a metal gate fashioned from scrapped machinery.
scrap_door.build_desc: a metal gate fashioned from scrapped machinery. secured by a passcode mechanism.

blowtorch.name: blowtorch
blowtorch.title: powered blowtorch
blowtorch.desc: a powerful torch, capable of melting weaker metals.

machete.name: machete
machete.title: machete
machete.desc: a long and sharp blade, its edge unevenly serrated, capable of heavy damage.

control_panel.name: control_panel
control_panel.title: control panel
control_panel.desc: a small screen with programmable buttons. capable of being rigged up to many different machines.

small_chest.name: small_chest
small_chest.title: small storage unit
small_chest.desc: a small structure capable of holding a lot of items.
small_chest.build_desc: a small structure capable of holding a lot of items.

axe.name: axe
axe.title: axe
axe.desc: a sharp axe, capable of breaking down strong structures.

radio.name: radio
radio.title: radiowave transmitter
radio.desc: a small screen and keypad capable of broadcasting messages globally through radiowaves. also capable of broadcasting on encrypted channels.
radio.func_desc: you can toggle the radio on or off, and set whether it should broadcast on an encrypted channel or not.

radio_transmit.client: MSG.open('enter a message to transmit globally. 100 character limit.', 'message', 100, 'transmit', 'cancel', 'radio_transmit');

radio_setchannel.client: MSG.open('enter any nine-character code to set an encryption channel. if you enter a blank code, it will be reset to transmit without encryption.', 'encryption code', 9, 'set channel', 'cancel', 'radio_set_channel');

large_chest.name: large_chest
large_chest.title: large storage unit
large_chest.desc: a large structure capable of holding a huge amount of items.
large_chest.build_desc: a small structure capable of holding a lot of items.

steel_block.name: steel_block
steel_block.title: reinforced steel fence
steel_block.desc: a kilometer's worth of reinforced steel fencing.
steel_block.build_desc: a kilometer of reinforced steel fencing. it can't be walked over, and takes a lot of time to break through.

sledgehammer.name: sledgehammer
sledgehammer.title: sledgehammer
sledgehammer.desc: a heavy hammer, capable of quick destruction.

steel_door.name: steel_door
steel_door.title: steel gate
steel_door.desc: a sturdy gate fashioned from strong steel.
steel_door.build_desc: a metal gate fashioned from scrapped machinery. secured by a small computer with a keypad.

charged_core.name: charged_core
charged_core.title: charged core
charged_core.desc: a spherical cell, capable of supplying a large amount of power.

player_scanner.name: player_scanner
player_scanner.title: low-range rescue scanner
player_scanner.desc: scans for intelligent life within a square radius of 30 kilometers, and beeps with volume proportional to the distance of the closest lifeform.
player_scanner.func_desc: scans for intelligent life within a square radius of 30 kilometers, and beeps with volume proportional to the distance of the closest lifeform.
player_scanner.func_start: ENGINE.log('the device has a single button on it, with an electric speaker next to it.');

player_scanner_highrange.name: player_scanner_highrange
player_scanner_highrange.title: high-range rescue scanner
player_scanner_highrange.desc: scans for intelligent life within a square radius of 100 kilometers, and will indicate the approximate direction.
player_scanner_highrange.func_desc: scans for intelligent life within a square radius of 100 kilometers, and will indicate the approximate direction.
player_scanner_highrange.func_start: ENGINE.log('the device shows a white light, a green light, and a red light, and an arrow that spins freely. you switch the scanner on and the white light activates.');

heat_masker.name: heat_masker
heat_masker.title: life signature mask
heat_masker.desc: when active, the user becomes impossible to detect by life scans.
heat_masker.func_desc: the atmosphere around you feels very cold.

ocean_platform.name: ocean_platform
ocean_platform.title: ocean platform
ocean_platform.desc: an intricate and sturdy platform designed to resist erosion in acidic water. capable of supporting travelers and structures on top of it.
ocean_platform.build_desc: an intricate and sturdy platform designed to resist erosion in acidic water. capable of supporting travelers and structures on top of it. if a structure atop it is destroyed, it will break as well.

metal_detector.name: metal_detector
metal_detector.title: metal detector
metal_detector.func_desc: while walking, the metal detector will ping if it finds useful materials underground automatically. if you have a shovel, you can also dig in place without needing to equip it.

dig_with_shovel.client: if (SUPPLIES.current['shovel'] !== undefined) {ENGINE.log('digging...', false);} else {ENGINE.log('you don\'t have a shovel.');}

scrap_metal.name: scrap_metal
scrap_metal.title: scrap metal
scrap_metal.desc: a few shards of metal. probably can be bent into useful shapes.

plastic.name: plastic
plastic.title: plastic pieces
plastic.desc: some different kinds of plastic, molded together.

cloth.name: cloth
cloth.title: cloth
cloth.desc: tattered and partially rotted fabric, but combined with others like it, could still be put to use.

soda_bottle.name: soda_bottle
soda_bottle.title: broken soda bottle
soda_bottle.desc: a broken glass soda bottle, the faded label of its blue and red logo still prominent.

fire_extinguisher.name: fire_extinguisher
fire_extinguisher.title: fire extinguisher
fire_extinguisher.desc: an empty metal can, once capable of saving lives, is now used to inflict pain.

circuit_board.name: circuit_board
circuit_board.title: circuit board
circuit_board.desc: old and broken, but its electric components can still be used.

keycard_a.name: keycard_a
keycard_a.title: keycard type a
keycard_a.desc: it describes itself as a security clearance card, with access limited to "group a".

keycard_e.name: keycard_e
keycard_e.title: keycard type e
keycard_e.desc: it describes itself as a security clearance card, with access limited to "group e".

pistol.name: pistol
pistol.title: pistol
pistol.desc: a small handgun, rusted but functional, capable of doing moderate damage over a medium range.

shotgun_shell.name: shotgun_shell
shotgun_shell.title: shotgun shell
shotgun_shell.desc: a cylinder of plastic containing several tiny metal balls. capable of inflicting heavy damage over a short range.

keycard_c.name: keycard_c
keycard_c.title: keycard type c
keycard_c.desc: it describes itself as a security clearance card, with access limited to "group c".

syringe.name: syringe
syringe.title: syringe
syringe.desc: intended for injecting liquids into a bloodstream.

steel_shard.name: steel_shard
steel_shard.title: steel shard
steel_shard.desc: high quality steel that seems to have been ripped off some old machine.

keycard_b.name: keycard_b
keycard_b.title: keycard type b
keycard_b.desc: it describes itself as a security clearance card, with access limited to "group b".

keycard_d.name: keycard_d
keycard_d.title: keycard type d
keycard_d.desc: it describes itself as a security clearance card, with access limited to "group d".

low_teleporter.name: low_teleporter
low_teleporter.title: low-range personal teleporter
low_teleporter.desc: capable of teleporting 100 kilometers in a cardinal direction. consumes 1 energy cell per teleport.
low_teleporter.func_desc: a delicate device that can teleport you 100km in any direction, if the current location or destination do not have too much interference. requires 1 energy cell to engage a teleport.
low_teleporter.func_start: ENGINE.log('you hold the device carefully in your hands. it\'s only capable of function if you have a energy cell available to power it.');

max_pass.name: max_pass
max_pass.title: maximum security pass
max_pass.desc: a keycard with maximum government clearance.

flash_drive.name: flash_drive
flash_drive.title: flash drive
flash_drive.desc: a small black rectangular device, with a metal prong sticking out of one end.

bp_low_teleporter.name: bp_low_teleporter
bp_low_teleporter.title: bp: low-range personal teleporter
bp_low_teleporter.desc: a blueprint for the creation of a device that can teleport you short distances.

bp_metal_detector.name: bp_metal_detector
bp_metal_detector.title: bp: metal detector
bp_metal_detector.desc: a blueprint for the creation of a device that can detect materials underground.

rope.name: rope
rope.title: rope
rope.desc: a small section of rope, its ends frayed.

alien_token.name: alien_token
alien_token.title: alien token
alien_token.desc: a small black ring, with a purple sphere shining like a jewel. a token of an ascended mind, from those who gave humanity another chance.

reality_anchor.name: reality_anchor
reality_anchor.title: personal reality anchor
reality_anchor.desc: anchors the user's reality to a specific location. upon death, the user will reincarnate wherever their anchor was placed.
reality_anchor.build_desc: place the anchor on the ground and it will activate automatically. if you craft a new anchor and place it somewhere else, you will reincarnate there and previously placed anchors will be forgotten. if your anchor ends up blocked off, such that there is no safe location to reincarnate next to it, the anchor will be forgotten. once the anchor is placed, it will permanently stay at that location until destroyed. it cannot be picked up and used again.
reality_anchor.build_start: ENGINE.log('the reality anchor glows as you hold it.');

high_teleporter.name: high_teleporter
high_teleporter.title: high-range personal teleporter
high_teleporter.desc: capable of teleporting 4000 kilometers in a cardinal direction. consumes 5 charged cores per teleport.
high_teleporter.func_desc: a heavy device that can teleport you 4000km in any direction, if the current location or destination do not have too much interference. requires 5 charged cores to engage a teleport.
high_teleporter.func_start: ENGINE.log('you hold the heavy device, electricity jolting out of its spherical slots. it\'s only capable of function if you have 5 charged cores available to power it.');

WORLD_MACHINE.name: WORLD_MACHINE
WORLD_MACHINE.title: THE WORLD MACHINE
WORLD_MACHINE.desc: a heavy black cube, with dozens of alien numbers etched into it on every side. an artifact of those who gave humanity another chance. it cannot be given away, and will disappear if you die.
WORLD_MACHINE.func_desc: there are no buttons, but you know that if you put forth mental willpower, it can be activated.
WORLD_MACHINE.func_start: ENGINE.log('the artifact pulls at your mind, beckoning you to activate it.');

battery.name: battery
battery.title: energy cell
battery.desc: a charged battery, from a time when energy was unlimited.

uranium.name: uranium
uranium.title: uranium
uranium.desc: a heavy rock, tinged with green and gold.

shotgun.name: shotgun
shotgun.title: shotgun
shotgun.desc: a pump-action shotgun, strong and sturdy, capable of dealing heavy damage over a short distance with a spray of metal pellets.

bullet.name: bullet
bullet.title: bullet
bullet.desc: a piece of lead wrapped in metal. capable of inflicting moderate damage over a medium range.

medical_pill.name: medical_pill
medical_pill.title: medicine pill
medical_pill.desc: a small pill taken from an unlabeled bottle. it's not clear what its effect is.

nuke.name: nuke
nuke.title: nuclear bomb
nuke.func_desc: will unleash a colossal explosion capable of incredible damage to the surrounding world. detonating will instantly kill you and anyone nearby, and all of your supplies will be vaporized.
nuke.func_start: ENGINE.log('the control panel blinks green, the activation button primed and ready.');

alien_phaser.name: alien_phaser
alien_phaser.title: alien material phaser
alien_phaser.desc: a unique and heavy device, built in an entirely inhuman way, that can phase its user through certain solid materials.

bp_high_teleporter.name: bp_high_teleporter
bp_high_teleporter.title: bp: high-range personal teleporter
bp_high_teleporter.desc: a blueprint for the creation of a device that can teleport you very long distances.

unknown material key.name: alien_key
unknown material key.title: unknown material key
unknown material key.desc: a hard, translucent, purple material, sculpted into an intricate key.

bp_boat.name: bp_boat
bp_boat.title: bp: small boat
bp_boat.desc: a blueprint for a vehicle that can float in water and resist acidic corrosion.

bp_reality_anchor.name: bp_reality_anchor
bp_reality_anchor.title: bp: personal reality anchor
bp_reality_anchor.desc: a blueprint for a device that can anchor ones life force to a specific location. it specifies use of an unknown material.

airwave_tower.name: airwave_tower
airwave_tower.title: radiowave disruption tower
airwave_tower.desc: a rudimentary tower that amplifies a specific electromagnetic wavelength to prevent teleportation into or out of its 8 kilometer range.
airwave_tower.build_desc: place the tower on the ground and it will activate automatically. travelers cannot teleport into or out of its 8 kilometer range.it cannot be picked up and used again.
